revision.text: ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== {{compound|nci|yāōtl|gloss1=enemy; (in compounds) war|tequitl|gloss2=task|-huah|gloss3=possessor of}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|/jaːoːtekiwaʔ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nci|noun|head=yāōtequihuah}} # [[war]] [[chief]] ===References=== * Lockhart, James. (2001) ''Nahuatl as Written'' Stanford University Press, p. 242. [[Category:nci:Military]] [[Category:nci:People]]
